pr_title: PLFM-6158 - Part C: Initial refactoring of EntityField dependency

timeline.message: PLFM-6158: Initial approach to get rid of EntityField
PLFM-6158: Deprecate method that depends on EntityField
PLFM-6158: Additional parameterization by object type

timeline.bodyText: Convert EntityField to be more generic -> ObjectField, and use it statically in many places, but not all.
timeline.author: john-hill

timeline.bodyText: needs a test or revert to the tested code.
timeline.author: john-hill
